00025 #ifndef _BASE_VENTRY_
00026 #define _BASE_VENTRY_
00027 
00028 #include <base/base>
00029 #include <base/ReferencedObject>
00030 #include <base/PathName>
00031 
00032 
00033 namespace base {
00034 
00035 
00036 class VEntry : public ReferencedObject
00037 {
00038 public:
00039   virtual ~VEntry() {}
00040 
00041   virtual bool operator==(const VEntry& e) const { return pathname==e.pathname; }
00042 
00043   virtual bool isDirectory() const = 0;
00044   virtual const PathName path() const { return pathname.path(); }
00045   virtual const PathName name() const { return pathname.name(); }
00046   virtual const PathName pathName() const { return pathname; }
00047   
00048 protected:  
00049   PathName pathname;
00050 
00051   VEntry() {}
00052   VEntry(const PathName& pn) : pathname(pn) {}
00053   VEntry(const VEntry& e) : pathname(e.pathname) {}
00054   virtual VEntry& operator=(const VEntry& e) { pathname=e.pathname; return *this; }
00055 
00056   friend class VDirectory;
00057   friend class VFile;
00058   friend class VFileSystem;
00059 };
00060 
00061 } // base
00062 
00063 #endif
